header.title: About GenMedia Creative Studio
header.introduction: Welcome to the GenMedia Creative Studio, an application showcasing Google Cloud's Vertex AI Generative Media models. This tool is designed to provide a hands-on experience with our powerful APIs for image, video, and music generation.

sections.title: Imagen
sections.description: The **Imagen** page allows you to generate images from text prompts. You can control various parameters like aspect ratio, style, and content type.

sections.title: Veo
sections.description: The **Veo** page is for video generation. You can create videos from a text prompt (text-to-video) or animate an existing image (image-to-video).

sections.title: Lyria
sections.description: The **Lyria** page lets you generate musical scores. Provide a prompt describing the mood, genre, or instruments you want to hear.

sections.title: Virtual Try-On
sections.description: This workflow allows you to see how a piece of clothing looks on a person. You provide an image of a person and an image of a garment, and the model generates a new image of the person wearing the item.

sections.title: Product in Scene
sections.description: This workflow, also known as Product Recontextualization, allows you to take a product image and place it in a new scene. You provide an image of the product and a text prompt describing the new scene, and the model generates a new image of the product in that scene.

sections.title: Motion Portraits
sections.description: This workflow allows you to animate a still image of a person. You provide an image of a person and a text prompt describing the desired motion, and the model generates a short video of the person moving.

sections.title: Character Consistency
sections.description: This workflow allows you to generate a consistent character across multiple images. You provide a text prompt describing the character, and the model generates a series of images of that character in different poses and settings.
